greeting.title: 1. Greeting Customers
greeting.description: Always begin with a warm, professional greeting:
examples: Good morning/afternoon, thank you for contacting us.
How may I assist you today?

star.task: Task - Identify what needs to be done

complaints.title: Handling Complaints
complaints.template: I understand your frustration, and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Let me look into this right away and find a solution for you.

technical.title: Technical Issues
technical.template: I'd be happy to help you resolve this technical issue. Can you please provide me with [specific information needed]?

billing.title: Billing Inquiries
billing.template: I'll review your account details to clarify this billing matter. May I have your account number or email address associated with the account?

diagnosticQuestions.title: Diagnostic Questions
questions: When did the issue first occur?
What were you trying to do?
Have you made any recent changes?

rapport.title: Building Rapport
techniques: Show genuine interest in their needs

needs.title: Identifying Needs
questions: What would an ideal solution look like?
How would this help your business?

expensive.response: I understand price is important. Let's look at the value and ROI this brings to your business...

think.objection: I need to think about it
think.response: Of course! What specific aspects would you like to consider? I can provide additional information to help with your decision.

current.objection: We're happy with our current solution
current.response: That's great to hear! Many of our customers felt the same way before seeing how we could enhance their current setup...
